title: lcs- biggest rival
body: Obviously 2015 lcs season is up and the biggest rival out there is obviously tsm and clg now I like clg only because of their botlane but I like tsm better in every way besides their jungler if they could find a reasonable jungler they could win championships and win most of their games even though they are in the top 3 na teams probably top 5 in the world but my main question is. who. Is going to win on the tsm clg game at 3/22 this year I think tsm will and my last question is. Who is the better team out of the two?

replies.body: You honestly think that CLG is a rival to TSM?  Really?  I mean, if you would have said C9 and TSM I could see it, but CLG?

I'm more surprised he said TSM was a Top 5 World team >.> (kappa).

GE.\
SKT..\ 
JinAir..> In no particular order because of fanboys :P
EDG.../  
OMG/ 
CJ./
  ||
  v
  ||
  v
NA/EU
  ||
  V
BR/SEA
Actually, judging by the last worlds, it's NA>BR>EU...  I'm just saying!

I don't want to get into the NA > EU or BR > EU or NA > BR > EU.

NA wins IEM/Battle of the Alantic (BotA was mainly by points).
EU wins a different IEM and some other international competition.
BR is forgotten until worlds unless they beat EL (Alliance again).

It's a moot point.
That use to be the big rivalry a long time ago, when CLG was relevant.
Yea, but like you said, that was a LONG time ago!  Back when Rainman used to play for TSM it was relevant..  Now, no one thinks these two are rivals in any but the most general sense.
clg has been non existent for quite a while now lol, that rivalry is dead. C9 and TSM rivalry however..

As a fan, I'm really hoping this is CLG's year. I'll be rooting for them. Also...TSM a top 5 team in the world? Not even close right now. They have the potential to be I guess, but it's very unlikely.
